title: Achraf Hakimi is back for Morocco Africa Cup of Nations campaign

Posted 12/20/25
Morocco captain Achraf Hakimi has recovered from an ankle injury in time for the Africa Cup of Nations. The current African Footballer of the Year is unlikely to start Sunday’s tournament-opener …
